Ini yang Bikin Pesawat Sriwijaya Air Delay
07 Nov 2019, 06:03 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: Dok. AP II

Jakarta - PT Garuda Indonesia Tbk kembali memutuskan hubungan dengan PT Sriwijaya Air. Imbasnya banyak penerbangan Sriwijaya Air dibatalkan. Bahyak penumpang Sriwijaya Air yang mengeluhkan gagal terbang. Mereka akhirnya banyak yang membeli lagi tiket penerbangan maskapai lain.Direktur Pemeliharaan dan Layanan Garuda, Iwan Joeniarto mengirimkan pesan berantai tentang instruksi operasional. Isinya menjelaskan penerbangan Sriwijaya Air yang dibatalkan dan alasannya.Direktur Teknik Sriwijaya Air Romdani Ardali Adang pun membenarkan isi instruksi operasional tersebut. Meskipun dia tidak menjelaskan secara rinci."Benar," ujarnya singkat kepada detikcom melalui pesan singkat, Kamis (7/11/2019).Dalam instruksi operasional itu menjelaskan, alasan beberapa batalnya penerbangan lantaran adanya keputusan dari Direksi Gapura kepada GM Gapura, bahwa terhitung 6 November 2020, pukul 15.00 wib Gapura tidak dapat memberikan pelayanan operasional kepada pihak Sriwijaya Air dan NAM.Alasan diberhentikannya pelayanan Gapura itu dikarenakan belum dipenuhinya kewajiban transfer top up cash basis. Alhasil terjadi delay yang berpotensi cancel flight.Berikut daftar penerbangan yang berpotensi dibatalkan penerbangannya:- SJ 692MDC - TTE08.10 wita- SJ 603MDC - CGK18.15 witaAnda jadi salah satu penumpang Sriwijaya yang delay terbang? This is what makes Sriwijaya Air Delay aircraft
Nov 7 2019, 06:03 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: Doc. AP II

Jakarta - PT Garuda Indonesia Tbk has once again severed ties with PT Sriwijaya Air. As a result, many Sriwijaya Air flights were canceled. Many Sriwijaya Air passengers complained about failing to fly. Finally, many of them bought another airline ticket. Garuda's Maintenance and Service Director, Iwan Joeniarto sent a chain message about operational instructions. The contents explained the canceled Sriwijaya Air flight and the reason. Sriwijaya Air Technical Director Romdani Ardali Adang also confirmed the contents of the operational instructions. Although he did not explain in detail. "True," he said briefly to AFP via text message on Thursday (11/07/2019). In the operational instructions explained, the reasons for some cancellations due to the decision of the Gapura Directors to GM Gapura, that counted November 6, 2020, at 3:00 p.m. Gapura could not provide operational services to Sriwijaya Air and NAM. The reason for the termination of the Gapura service was that it had not fulfilled the obligation to top up cash basis transfers. As a result, delays that have the potential to cancel flights occur. Following is the list of flights with potentially canceled flights: - SJ 692MDC - TTE08.10 wita- SJ 603MDC - CGK18.15 witaYou are one of the Sriwijaya passengers who have flight delays?
